data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Ñeembucú.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ñeembucú, Paraguay
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 77,600 people living in Ñeembucú, Paraguay. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 6,218 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Ñeembucú, Paraguay to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Ñeembucú who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Ñeembucú, Paraguay a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Ñeembucú.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

location.name: Ñeembucú
location.cities_list: Itatí, Cerrito, Paso de Patria, Laureles
location.cities_list_w_pop: Itatí (7,902), Cerrito (1,036), Paso de Patria (853), Laureles (708)
